text: Kdybych byl tátou is a 1939 Czechoslovak comedy film, directed by Miroslav Cikán. It stars Jindřich Plachta, Hana Vítová, and Bohunka Nosková. ==References== ==External links== *Kdybych byl tátou at the Internet Movie Database Category:1939 films Category:Czechoslovak films Category:Czechoslovak comedy films Category:1939 comedy films Category:Films directed by Miroslav Cikán Category:Czech films Category:Czechoslovak black-and-white films
title: Kdybych byl tátou
